data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Massa, Bruno, Fontana, Paolo (2011): Supraspecific taxonomy of Palaearctic Platycleidini with unarmed prosternum: a morphological approach (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae, Tettigoniinae). Zootaxa 2837: 1-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.296570
